DOC.brief_title: Effects Static Stretching Dynamic Flexibility Performance : Blind Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: It randomize , blind clinical trial first researcher ( P1 ) responsible assessment reassessment ; second searcher ( P2 ) randomization inquiry subject intervention protocol third investigator ( P3 ) statistical analyzes.The research conduct Laboratory therapeutic practice Department Physical Therapy , Federal University Rio Grande Norte ( UFRN ) start approval ethic committee.The sample recruit convenience write disclosure , electronics personal contact academies high education institution city Natal / RN . The volunteer randomly distribute electronic site http : //www.randomization.com ( Code : 21318 ) . Two piece information insert , namely : sample size number group . With data , site generate specific encode group distribute subject randomly three group : static stretching ( gAE ) ; dynamic stretching ( gAD ) control ( gC ) . Sample size calculation For sample size calculation use G * Power 3.1.0 software procedure follow recommendation study prévios45 . Based pilot study four volunteer , adopt power 0.95 , consider significance level 5 % , correlation coefficient 0.5 , 0.25 effect size , It calculate `` n '' sample 15 individual group ( `` n '' sample = 45 ) . This analysis perform reduce chance Type II error determine minimum number individual require investigation . Thus , sample size sufficient provide 95.5 % statistical power . Procedures evaluation measure At first subject record survey evaluation form contain information identification , weight , height , injury history physical activity . After process randomization allocation hold P2 , volunteer undergo first evaluation ( AV1 ) instruction P1 . This evaluation perform least 48 hour 1st stretch session prevent possible residual effect isokinetic functional testing . Other evaluation AV2 , AV3 AV4 , make immediately 1st ( acute response ) 10th session ( acute post elongation ) 48 hour last ( residual chronic response ) , respectively , EAG GAD . DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) male ; ( 2 ) age 18 28 year old ; ( 3 ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 21 25 kg / m2 , ( 4 ) participate low limb stretch program ; ( 5 ) healthy , accord Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) perform physical activity ( recreational , competitive level ) least 3 time week , accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) ( 6 ) history injury disease low limb last six month , without previous surgery segment ; ( 7 ) lack musculoskeletal , cardiorespiratory neurological disorder prevent completion evaluation treatment protocol ; ( 8 ) effect medicine cause muscle relaxation inhibit muscle tonic action ( 9 ) ROM limitation ( degree muscle shorten ) least 15 ° active extension joelho21 , nondominant leg ( consider 180 full extent hip position 90 ° flexion ) . ( 1 ) start stretch practice daily activity study period ; ( 2 ) perform evaluative intervention procedure ; ( 3 ) absence least one session stretch protocol ; ( 4 ) appearance lesion period subject insert survey ; ( 5 ) withdrawal study . Thus , exclude eight volunteer , three per occurrence injury study period five per withdrawal , conclude study total 45 subject .
